archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0374
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a product owner, I want the ability to link multiple base plans across accounts under one Organisation and discount accordingly, so that I can create bundled offers

properties.value: Is the discount for the subset of Organization's products? Or rather company has 100 subs - discount X% Based on the volume of subscriptions

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
